thumb.title: [TAS] 3DS 洞窟物語３Ｄ（Cave Story 3D） "game end glitch" by periwinkle in 03:26.45
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6dHBLhItpYQ以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6440M TAS originally published on 2025-03-17Cave Story 3D is a 2.5D remake of the indie darling Cave Story, developed by Nicalis and published by NIS. It expands the original game with extra areas, remixed music and new graphics. Watch as periwinkle ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/periwinkle) achieves the "Normal Ending" using methods that are completely unintended in record time.Commentary is avaliable for this run in the form of closed captions.
thumb.last_res_body: おわった え、え、え え？ ？？ 解説がないとこの... Ｓｕｅを差し上げます
